name: Kiko Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of neuroscience-based adaptive games designed to target the skills for school success. The company's application is designed to challenge cognitive learning skills such as memory, focus, and reasoning which are necessary groundwork for learning in kindergarten and beyond, helping children develop their minds.
